rename.from: Make TestCase methods protected that should have been protected all along
rename.to: Make `TestCase` methods `protected` that should have been `protected` all along

issue.title: Roadmap v3 / PHPUnit 11

repository.name: PHPUnit-Polyfills
repository.description: Set of polyfills for changed PHPUnit functionality to allow for creating PHPUnit cross-version compatible tests

issue.body:
PHPUnit 11 has just been released.

As this is a major release with breaking changes, upgrading should be a done deliberately and managed.
This effectively means that upgrading to a PHPUnit Polyfills version which supports PHPUnit 11 should also be done deliberately and managed, so the Polyfills should get a new major release. 

The intention is for the `1.x` series and `2.x` series to continue to be maintained, for as long as [PHPUnit continues to make PHPUnit 9.x/10.x compatible with new PHP versions](https://phpunit.de/supported-versions.html).

Refs:
* https://phpunit.de/announcements/phpunit-11.html
* https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/blob/main/ChangeLog-11.0.md


## Proposed Roadmap for PHPUnit Polyfills 3.0 / PHPUnit 11.0 support

- [x] Update README links in the 2.x branch to point to the PHPUnit 10 manual. - PR #190
- [x] Add a `3.x` branch.
    - [x] Add branch protection rules for the 3.x branch
- [x] Drop support for PHPUnit < 6.4 / PHP < 7.0. - PRs #192 + #193
- [x] Verify if the visibility of available methods needs to be updated. See sebastianbergmann/phpunit#5213 - PR #197
- [x] Remove the [`AssertAttributeHelper`](https://github.com/Yoast/PHPUnit-Polyfills#yoastphpunitpolyfillshelpersassertattributehelper) which was only intended to buy people a little more time to upgrade to PHPUnit 9.x. - PR #194
- [x] Add a new polyfill for the new `expectUserDeprecationMessage()` and `expectUserDeprecationMessageMatches()` methods. See sebastianbergmann/phpunit#5605 - PR #200
- [x] Add a new polyfill for the new `assertArrayIs*ToArray*ListOfKeys()` assertions. See sebastianbergmann/phpunit#5600 - PR #198
- [x] Add a new polyfill for the new PHPUnit 11.2+ `assertObjectNotEquals()` assertion. See sebastianbergmann/phpunit#5811 - PR #199
- [x] Verify the documentation is in line with the changes. PR #203
- [x] Allow PHPUnit 11.x. - PR #196

## Request for comments

This roadmap is open for comments.

issue.title: PHPUnit 11 | Make select methods `protected`

repository.name: PHPUnit-Polyfills
repository.description: Set of polyfills for changed PHPUnit functionality to allow for creating PHPUnit cross-version compatible tests

issue.body:
PHPUnit 11.0 changed the visibility of a number of `TestCase` methods from `public` to `protected`, so the PHPUnit Polyfills should follow suit.

For the Polyfills, the only affected method is the polyfilled `expectExceptionMessageMatches()` method.

Refs:
* sebastianbergmann/phpunit#5213
* https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/commit/8b8e38e962c1aa9b2a2497c00f66dc364f02092d

repository.name: PHP-CS-Fixer
repository.description: A tool to automatically fix PHP Coding Standards issues

issue.body: Since PHPUnit 11, certain methods are no longer static, https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5213.

body:
The fact that some of the methods are not static anymore did not make it to the changelog.

It's not a big deal (I don't mind the change) but I wonder what the reasoning behind that was. Seems random to me. Care to explain?

> The fact that some of the methods are not static anymore did not make it to the changelog.
> 
> It's not a big deal (I don't mind the change) but I wonder what the reasoning behind that was. Seems random to me. Care to explain?

I agree. It would have been great to have had these changes referenced in the changelog for more awareness.

issue.title: `php_unit_test_case_static_method_calls` is not sync with PHPUnit 11+

labels.name: status/to verify
labels.description: issue needs to be confirmed or analysed to continue

repository.name: PHP-CS-Fixer
repository.description: A tool to automatically fix PHP Coding Standards issues

issue.body:
### Problem description

Since PHPUnit 11+, multiple method from TestCase went from `public static` to `protected` (not static).
https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5213

(also some methods doesn't exists anymore).

So some methods should be removed from
https://github.com/PHP-CS-Fixer/PHP-CS-Fixer/blob/3a8911d215b32d3ea19ef8ebd1287672ac36f834/src/Fixer/PhpUnit/PhpUnitTestCaseStaticMethodCallsFixer.php#L357-L376

What should be the strategy to update this list ?
An option to chose the expect PHPUnit version ? Automatically detecting it from composer ? Something else ?

### Minimal reproducer CLI command

vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer

### Minimal reproducer code snippet

$this->createMock(Foo::class)->expects($this->once());

### Fixer version

3.71.0

### PHP version

8.3

### How do you run Fixer?

Composer package

### Contribution Checks

- [x] I have verified if this problem was already reported
- [x] I am familiar with ["Feature or bug?"](https://github.com/PHP-CS-Fixer/PHP-CS-Fixer/blob/master/feature-or-bug.rst)
